离线注册pycharm
This text is the activation-code (copy and paste it in the activation code part).
This is another way to activate PHPstorm(PyCharm) instead of using license server.

For Windows Users:
go to C:\Windows\System32\drivers\etc
Add this line "0.0.0.0 account.jetbrains.com" (without quotes)

For Linux/Mac users:
Open /etc/hosts file. (go to terminal and type: sudo nano /etc/hosts)
Add this line "0.0.0.0 account.jetbrains.com" (without quotes)
